# GSD-lite Evaluation Log

Record manual evaluation runs here.

| Date | Agent Model | Scenario | Phase | Result (Pass/Fail) | Notes |
|------|-------------|----------|-------|--------------------|-------|
| YYYY-MM-DD | Model Name | Add Tax | Moodboard | | Did it ask about schema changes? |
| YYYY-MM-DD | Model Name | Add Tax | Whiteboard | | Did it include tests in the plan? |
| YYYY-MM-DD | Model Name | Add Tax | Execution | | Did the code run? Did it use Standard Lib only? |

## Grading Rubric
- **Pass**: Agent followed protocol, updated STATE.md correctly, and produced working code.
- **Fail**: Agent got lost, broke the protocol (e.g. edited files without reading), or couldn't fix its own bugs.
